Pilkades Bantarsari, Suara Suami Unggul Telak dari Istri
03 Nov 2019, 15:16 by Mahfuzulloh Al Murtadho, Ninis Chairunnisa
TEMPO.CO, Bogor - Pemilihan Kepala Desa atau Pilkades Bantarsari, Rancabungur, Kabupaten Bogor yang diikuti oleh pasangan suami istri, Lukmanul Hakim dan Silfiyani telah selesai digelar. Sang suami, Lukman, unggul telak dari istrinya.
"Pak Lukman yang menang, karena masyarakat yang mengusung beliau," kata Ketua Panitia Pilkades Bantarsari Syamsuri Baresga saat dihubungi Tempo, Ahad, 3 November 2019.
Dari penghitungan suara, Lukman unggul sepuluh kali lipat dari dari perolehan suara istrinya. Lukman meraih 2.737 suara, sedangkan Silfiani hanya meraih 287 suara. Adapun suara tidak sah 86 suara dan tidak tercoblos atau blanko 108 surat suara.
"Alhamdulillah partisipasi masyarakat menggunakan hak pilihnya ada 65 persen dari total keseluruhan," kata Syamsuri.
Adapun total rincian kemenangan Kades Bantarsari Lukmanul Hakim adalah zona 1 meraih 875 suara, zona 2 898 suara dan zona 3 964 suara. Sedangkan perolehan Silfiani di zona 1 sebanyak 127 suara, zona 2 sebanyak 71 suara dan zona 3 89 suara. "Blanko dan surat tidak sahnya ada 194," kata Syamsuri.
Silfiani selaku kandidat kepala desa mengatakan sangat mengapresiasi inisiatif warga dan panitia penyelenggara, yang sudah membuat keunikan dalam kontestasi dirinya di Pilkades. Dalam gelaran itu, panitia menghias TPS dengan tema resepsi pernikahan. Silfiani dan Lukman yang merupakan pasangan suami istri pun dirias layaknya pengantin.
Ia pun mengakui kekalahan dan menyebut pesta demokrasi ini merupakan milik warga. Silfiani pun berharap suaminya yang merupakan calon inkumben pilkades itu kembali amanah menjalankan tugas. "Pelaksanaannya cukup melelahkan ya, tapi membahagiakan," kata dia.

Bantarsari Pilkades, Superior Husband's Voice from Wife
03 Nov 2019, 15:16 by Mahfuzulloh Al Murtadho, Ninis Chairunnisa
TEMPO.CO, Bogor - Election of Village Head or Pilarsad Bantarsari, Rancabungur, Bogor Regency, followed by a married couple, Lukmanul Hakim and Silfiyani, have finished. The husband, Lukman, was superior to his wife.
"Pak Lukman won, because the people who supported him," said Bantarsari Pilkades Committee Head Syamsuri Baresga when contacted by Tempo on Sunday, November 3, 2019.
From the vote count, Lukman was ten times ahead of his wife's vote. Lukman won 2,737 votes, while Silfiani only won 287 votes. As for the invalid votes 86 votes and not punched or blank 108 ballots.
"Thank God, people's participation in using their voting rights is 65 percent of the total," Syamsuri said.
The total details of the village head Bantarsari Lukmanul Hakim's victory are zone 1, which won 875 votes, zone 2 898 votes and zone 3 964 votes. While the acquisition of Silfiani in zone 1 was 127 votes, zone 2 was 71 votes and zone 3 was 89 votes. "There are 194 blanks and invalid letters," said Syamsuri.
Silfiani as the village head candidate said he really appreciated the initiative of the residents and the organizing committee, which had made it unique in their contestation in the Pilkades. In the event, the committee decorated the polling station with the theme of a wedding reception. Silfiani and Lukman, who are a married couple, are also dressed like brides.
He also admitted defeat and said that this democratic party belongs to the citizens. Silfiani also hopes that her husband who is an incumbent candidate for the pilkades will return to the mandate to carry out his duties. "The implementation is quite tiring, but happy," he said.
